thread.title: The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 Release Date & Time
thread.title_full: The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 Release Date & Time

author: Silki Joshi
title: The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 Release Date & Time
text:
Are you eager to know
[The Chi](/tag/The-Chi) Season 6 Episode 16 release date and time? Here’s everything you will need to enjoy the season’s finale. The season takes viewers on a dramatic journey as they witness the tough decisions faced by Chicago’s South Side residents.
Here is everything you want to know about The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 release date and time.
When is The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 release date and time?
The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 will be released on Friday, June 28 on Paramount Plus with Showtime. It will be available on Showtime two days after the release, i.e. June 30.
The episode will be released at:
- 9:00 P.M. PST
- 12:00 A.M EST
Where to watch The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 finale?
Similar to the previous episodes, viewers can watch The Chi Season 6 Episode 16 online on Paramount Plus with Showtime.
Created by Lena Waithe, the show closely follows the lives of Emmett, Brandon, Ronnie, and Kevin as they grapple with their personal demons. In this season, the residents of South Chicago are forced to face the challenges arising from the murder of Quentin Dickinson.
The show features a talented cast, including Alex R. Hibbert as Kevin Williams, Jacob Latimore as Emmett Washington, Yolonda Ross as Jada Washington, Michael Epps as Jake Taylor, Birgundi Baker as Kiesha Williams, and others.
Here is an official synopsis of the series:
“A relevant, timely and distinctive coming-of-age story following a half dozen interrelated characters in the South Side of Chicago. The story centers on Brandon, an ambitious and confident young man who dreams about opening a restaurant of his own someday, but is conflicted between the promise of a new life and his responsibility to his mother and teenage brother back in the South Side.”
